function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global reliance on fossil fuels and lack of subsidies for sustainable alternatives","Impact":"Contributes to climate change and air pollution, increasing the risk of respiratory diseases and pandemics","Mitigation":"Investing in sustainable productions, low-carbon transportation, and renewable materials; divesting from fossil-fuel activities","Technologies":"Renewable energy technology, low-carbon transportation, organic farming, recyclable materials","People":"Global population, especially those in heavily industrialized areas","Owner":"Governments, international organizations, and private sector"},{"Description":"Failure to achieve Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) by 2030","Impact":"Continued unsustainable social and economic practices, leading to environmental degradation, inequality, and health risks","Mitigation":"Implementing sustainable socio-technical systems, sectorial entry points for transformation, and a systemic approach to sustainable development","Technologies":"Sustainable technologies, socio-technical systems, and holistic sustainability frameworks","People":"Global population, especially marginalized communities and developing countries","Owner":"Global organizations, governments, and private sector"},{"Description":"Lack of policies addressing the interrelation between biodiversity conservation, food security, and pandemic prevention","Impact":"Increased risk of zoonotic disease transmission, food insecurity, and loss of biodiversity","Mitigation":"Implementing mutually beneficial policies that address the interconnection between SDGs related to biodiversity conservation, food security, and pandemic prevention","Technologies":"Biodiversity conservation techniques, sustainable agricultural practices, and zoonotic disease prevention strategies","People":"Global population, especially those reliant on natural resources for food and livelihoods","Owner":"International organizations, governments, and environmental stakeholders"}]}
